feed.title: MSFS Blog
feed.subtitle: Development updates of Microsoft Flight Simulator.

entry.title: AG Sim, Perfect Flight and V Pilot Designs Sale
entry.summary: Enjoy discounted pricing on Marketplace content from AG Sim, Perfect Flight and V Pilot Designs.

entry.title: August 17th, 2023 Development Update
entry.summary: August 18th is the three-year anniversary of the PC launch of Microsoft Flight Simulator! To the over 12 million sim pilots who have flown with us on PC, Xbox Series X|S, and Xbox Cloud Gaming: thank you for your support!

entry.title: Anniversary Sale: 65+ Items On Sale Now in the Marketplace
entry.summary: For 7 Days starting on August 18th, save up to 50% on more than 65 items.

entry.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator Releases City Update IV: Western Europe
entry.summary: Explore some of Western Europe’s most breathtaking cities from the air in Microsoft Flight Simulator’s latest addition to its rich global experience.Microsoft Flight Simulator City Update IV celebrates the wonderfully diverse character of Western Europe by highlighting five of its most renowned cities: France’s Annemasse; Geneva, Switzerland; Belgium’s Ghent; Luxembourg City; and Rotterdam in the … Continued

entry.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator Releases Local Legend 12: The Dornier Do X Flying Boat
entry.summary: The largest flying boat in history is now available for simmers to fly throughout the globe in Microsoft Flight Simulator!On July 12, 1929, the dream creation of German aircraft designer Claudius Dornier, the Do X, took off from Lake Constance, just outside of the Swiss town of Altenrhein. Powered by 12 roaring, 610-horsepower V-12 piston … Continued

entry.title: FlightSimExpo Partner Series: Next Level Racing
entry.summary: The Microsoft Flight Simulator team will be attending FlightSimExpo in Houston, Texas from June 23-25! If you’re at the expo, be sure to stop by our booth in the Waltrip Hangar to meet the MSFS Team and try some great products from some of our hardware partners.Today we’re pleased to highlight one partner who is providing a … Continued

entry.title: FlightSimExpo 2023: A Reflection on Our First Expo
entry.summary: Last Friday a group of more than 20 members of the Microsoft Flight Simulator team arrived at the Lone Star Museum to begin setup of our booth with both enthusiasm and a twinge of apprehension as we embarked on our first ever FlightSimExpo experience. Some of us shook hands for the first time, as our … Continued

entry.title: McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom II by DC Designs
entry.summary: The McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom II is an American tandem two-seat, twin-engine, all-weather, long-range supersonic jet interceptor and fighter-bomber originally developed by McDonnell Aircraft for the United States Navy.Proving highly adaptable, it entered service with the Navy in 1961 before it was adopted by the United States Marine Corps and the United States Air Force, … Continued
